sourcing.instructions: Arsenic can be obtained from chemical supply companies or specialized online retailers. Ensure to handle it with proper safety precautions.
steps: Arsenic can be obtained from chemical supply companies or specialized online retailers. Ensure to handle it with proper safety precautions.
1. Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), including gloves, goggles, and a lab coat.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE), including gloves, goggles, and a lab coat.

steps: 1. Place the crucible in a furnace set to 800째C (1472째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Place the crucible in a furnace set to 800째C (1472째F).

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally. Do not open the furnace until it has cooled down to avoid thermal shock.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow it to cool to room temperature naturally. Do not open the furnace until it has cooled down to avoid thermal shock.

steps: 1. Use a diamond file or sandpaper to shape and smooth the edges of the solid sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Use a diamond file or sandpaper to shape and smooth the edges of the solid sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
